entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Salmon Arm
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.3°C
